course.subject: MGMT
course.name: Business, Environment and Sustainability
course.description: This course will address topics of: business activities and their impact on the environment; strategies firms have taken to include environment into their actions; how inclusion of environment in corporate strategy changes how we think about strategy; and the future of corporate sustainability. Additional topics may be included depending on timeliness and relevance, e.g.  cleantech investment, renewable energies, mainland China policies. Graded P or F.
